title: How to draw a scenario or situation that shows the relationship between kinetic and potential energies - Quora

response.answer_text: How can you draw a scenario or situation that shows the relationship between kinetic and potential energies? Did you miss my answer to your first variation of this question? … Here it is again: Short answer: In full agreement with Dr Cousens, I’ll just add this neat GIF animation:  Again — thanks for asking, Yanna!

The classic example is of a pendulum. At the start of the swing, it has gravitational potential - as it speeds up it converts potential into kinetic - and as it crosses the center of the swing, starts to convert kinetic back into potential. Over and over again. In a frictionless setup - the interplay between kinetic and potential is continual and perpetual.
